video.title: The Legend of Korra
video.synopsis: An avatar who can control the elements fights to keep her city safe from the evil forces of both the physical and spiritual worlds.

episodes.synopsis: Now that Avatar Korra can bend water, earth and fire, she is anxious to start her airbender training, but trouble in the city interrupts her plans.
episodes.title: Welcome to Republic City

episodes.synopsis: After solving a problem in her airbender training with Master Tenzin, Korra visits the Pro-Bending Arena in search of inspiration.
episodes.title: A Leaf in the Wind

episodes.synopsis: Korra infiltrates the Equalists Movement and finds out more about its mysterious leader; when Bolin is kidnapped, Mako and Korra come to the rescue.
episodes.title: The Revelation

episodes.synopsis: Korra is recruited to join forces with Tarrlok, a member of the Council, who seeks a way to free the city from the grips of Equalist forces.
episodes.title: The Voice in the Night

episodes.synopsis: Korra and her Fire Ferret teammates struggle to forgive and work as a team after certain romantic rivalries throw them off balance.
episodes.title: The Spirit of Competition

episodes.synopsis: Korra and the Fire Ferrets prepare for the Pro-Bending Championship, but can the game go on when an evil threat looms over the arena?
episodes.title: And the Winner Is…

episodes.synopsis: Korra begins to suspect that one of her allies may be working for the Equalists; Tarrlok publicly denounces Lin and calls for her resignation.
episodes.title: The Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: Korra faces the counselor Tarrlok, who cracks down on Republic City as the Equalist movement begins to grow and garner strength.
episodes.title: When Extremes Meet

episodes.synopsis: Korra tries to understand her cryptic visions; Tenzin and Beifong search for the Equalists’s hostages, but their plan is based on false information.
episodes.title: Out of the Past

episodes.synopsis: The Equalists ferociously attack Republic City. In the midst of the battle, airbenders hide, a child is born, and warships answer the city's plea.
episodes.title: Turning the Tides

episodes.synopsis: As the war intensifies, Korra discovers a secret about the Anti-Bending Revolution; Korra's compatriots seize an Equalist stronghold.
episodes.title: Skeletons in the Closet

episodes.synopsis: Korra faces off with the mysterious leader of the Equalists as the war for Republic City comes to a head. Does she posses the power to beat him?
episodes.title: Endgame

episodes.synopsis: Korra fights to find a connection to the Spirit World while she and her crew attend the festival held by the Water Tribe of the South.
episodes.title: Rebel Spirit

episodes.synopsis: On a journey to the South Pole, Korra and Unalaq travel through a dangerous whirlpool and find a source of spiritual energy.
episodes.title: The Southern Lights

episodes.synopsis: While tensions emerge between the Water Tribe of the North and South, Korra fights to stay neutral but must save Unalaq from Southern fighters.
episodes.title: Civil Wars: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Korra must fight for her parents' freedom when they are arrested and falsely accused. Meanwhile, Ikki and Tenzin reconnect with their siblings.
episodes.title: Civil Wars: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When the president of the United Republic refuses to help Korra, she decides to take matters into her own hands.
episodes.title: Peacekeepers

episodes.synopsis: When the Triad's activities threaten to put Future Industries out of business, Mako investigates and discovers a grand conspiracy.
episodes.title: The Sting

episodes.synopsis: Korra discovers the epic origins of the mythical first Avatar, who struggled in a world filled with poverty and hunger 10,000 years ago.
episodes.title: Beginnings: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Korra dives into the past of Avatar and figures out what she needs in order to restore equilibrium between the physical and spiritual world.
episodes.title: Beginnings: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Korra asks Tenzin to help her gain access to the Spirit World for the first time. Varrick frames Mako, who's arrested by the police.
episodes.title: The Guide

episodes.synopsis: Korra enters the Spirit World, where she struggles with the relationship between the Avatar and the spirits.
episodes.title: A New Spiritual Age

episodes.synopsis: When President Raiko is attacked, Bolin saves the day. Meanwhile, Korra approaches Varrick for help in foiling Unalaq's plans.
episodes.title: Night of a Thousand Stars

episodes.synopsis: After learning that the Southern rebels have been defeated, Korra and her team work to close the spirit portals before the Harmonic Convergence.
episodes.title: Harmonic Convergence

episodes.synopsis: Korra discovers a new twist in Unalaq's evil plan, and Tenzin realizes that he must face his own demons to save his daughter.
episodes.title: Darkness Falls

episodes.synopsis: After recovering from Unalaq's attack, Korra discovers a way that she can defeat the ultimate dark spirit and save the world.
episodes.title: Light in the Dark

episodes.synopsis: Following the Harmonic Convergence, Korra discovers an unexpected consequence to Republic City. Bumi and others suddenly have the ability to Airbend.
episodes.title: A Breath of Fresh Air

episodes.synopsis: As Korra, Tenzin and Team Avatar work to recruit new Airbenders and restore Air Nation, evil criminal Zaheer begins building his own dangerous team.
episodes.title: Rebirth

episodes.synopsis: The team heads to Ba Sing Se to negotiate with the Earth Queen for new Airbender recruits. Mako and Bolin connect with family they've never met.
episodes.title: The Earth Queen

episodes.synopsis: After discovering that Ba Sing Se's Airbenders are being imprisoned by the Earth Queen, Korra decides the team must stay and help.
episodes.title: In Harm's Way

episodes.synopsis: While Zaheer infiltrates Air Temple Island attempting to find the Avatar, the team and Lin Beifong head to the city of Zaofu to meet a new Airbender.
episodes.title: The Metal Clan

episodes.synopsis: Still in Zaofu, Korra practices metalbending and Lin Beifong undergoes acupuncture to restore memories and manage resentment about her past with Su.
episodes.title: Old Wounds

episodes.synopsis: New Airbender recruits have difficulty adjusting to Tenzin's training methods, until Pema intervenes with wise cultural integration advice.
episodes.title: Original Airbenders

episodes.synopsis: As Opal prepares to leave Zaofu and begin Airbender training, Zaheer and his gang, the Red Lotus infiltrate the city and capture the Avatar.
episodes.title: The Terror Within

episodes.synopsis: The team travels to deep Earth Kingdom, where Bolin and Mako inquire about Aiwei's whereabouts and Korra hunts for details about the Red Lotus.
episodes.title: The Stakeout

episodes.synopsis: Korra and Asami are stranded in the Si Wong Desert. Mako and Bolin must wait in prison while the Red Lotus negotiates a deal with the Earth Queen.
episodes.title: Long Live the Queen

episodes.synopsis: Ba Sing Se is in turmoil, while Mako and Bolin search the Si Wong Desert for Korra and Asami and attempt to warn Tenzin of the Red Lotus' plans.
episodes.title: The Ultimatum

episodes.synopsis: Korra sacrifices herself to save the Red Lotus' captives. Bolin finds a use for his new lavabending skills. Zaheer makes a move for the Avatar.
episodes.title: Enter the Void

episodes.synopsis: Chaos reigns as Korra and the team battle Zaheer and his Red Lotus. Jinora steps into a new position and makes a proclamation about Air Nation.
episodes.title: Venom of the Red Lotus

episodes.synopsis: After traveling for six months and hiding her true identity, Korra prepares to reunite with Team Avatar in a revived Republic City.
episodes.title: After All These Years

episodes.synopsis: Korra recalls her hardships over the past few years while recovering from Zaheer's poison and dedicates herself to restoring her bending skills.
episodes.title: Korra Alone

episodes.synopsis: The prince's leadership ability is called into question. Tenzin orders his children to search for Korra, who hides while training in the Foggy Swamp.
episodes.title: The Coronation

episodes.synopsis: Tension runs high for Tenzin's children as they continue the search for Korra, who tries to locate the airbenders while coming to terms with her past.
episodes.title: The Calling

episodes.synopsis: Suyin and the metal city fight to remain free from Kuvira's control, while Korra returns to Zaofu to negotiate with the Earth Empire.
episodes.title: Enemy at the Gates

episodes.synopsis: Forced to choose, Korra decides to do what is right for Suyin and the metal city: a true test of her recovery, training and state of mind.
episodes.title: The Battle of Zaofu

episodes.synopsis: Back in Republic City, Korra's homecoming is bittersweet. First, she informs Tenzin of the battle in Zaofu, then reunites with Asami and Mako.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: The team touches on the past memories to draw strength for future challenges: Mako recalls when he first met Korra, while she questions her value.
episodes.title: Remembrances

episodes.synopsis: After the spirit vines capture a group of tourists, Korra and Opal interrupt a meeting of world leaders to shed light on Kuvira's plans.
episodes.title: Beyond the Wilds

episodes.synopsis: Opal, Bolin and Lin launch a mission to rescue Suyin and her family, and Korra implores the spirits to help defend the city against Kuvira.
episodes.title: Operation: Beifong

episodes.synopsis: Kuvira announces plans to reclaim the United Republic of Nations for the Earth Empire, and Team Avatar must warn Republic City of the imminent threat.
episodes.title: Kuvira's Gambit

episodes.synopsis: After a narrow escape, Team Avatar seeks help from Hiroshi Sato in devising a plan to infiltrate and destroy Kuvira's monstrous mecha suit.
episodes.title: Day of the Colossus

episodes.synopsis: Korra and Team Avatar come together in a final battle to defeat Kuvira and restore peace to the United Republic of Nations.
episodes.title: The Last Stand
